title: Consider the Data Type
text: Think about whether the data is categorical or numerical.

title: Focus on Distribution
text: A histogram is used to show the distribution of numerical data.

title: Identify the Chart Type
text: Histograms are effective for displaying the frequency of data within certain ranges over a certain range, and will only consider one variable.

title: Compare with Other Charts
text: Unlike pie charts or line graphs, histograms are specifically designed for showing distributions of only one variable. Pie charts and line graphs can show multiple.
